00019 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00020 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00021 from PyQt4.uic import *
00022 from Koo.Common import Common
00023 from AbstractKeyboardWidget import *
00024 
00025 (KeyboardWidgetUi, KeyboardWidgetBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('keyboard.ui') )
00026 
00027 class KeyboardWidget(AbstractKeyboardWidget, KeyboardWidgetUi):
00028         ## @brief Creates a KeyboardWidget that will send keyboard events to it's parent. It will
00029         # also be positioned in the screen acording to its parent coordinates.
00030         def __init__(self, parent):
00031                 AbstractKeyboardWidget.__init__(self, parent)
00032                 KeyboardWidgetUi.__init__( self )
00033                 self.setupUi( self )
00034                 self.init()
